title: Yahweh Charitable Trust
text: Yahweh charitable trust for (fCS) which has been founded in the year 2021, has been working with a vision and zeal of helping hand for the underprivileged children. Our main motto is to create a society without illiteracy, poverty and homeless for one and all. We are working on various planned projects which will concentrate towards animal , birds and conservation of our nature. Lets join hands and do our part in ensuring that we leave behind a positive impact on future generations by joining our hands together. Where our actions towards a responsible society speaks louder than our words. Appreciate your valuable time given for us, hope you will do your part for a better society.
